head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FARRELL, AMY GLADYS

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FARRELL, AMY GLADYS

block.p: FARRELL-Amy Gladys. On Oct. 20, 2000. Born February 23, 1911. Wife of Herman D. Farrell Sr. of Jamaica, West Indies. Mother of State Assemblyman Herman D. Farrell Jr., grandmother of Monique Guidry and Herman D. Farrell III, and great-grandmother of Simone Guidry. Reposing at Benta Funeral Home, 630 St. Nicholas Ave, at 141st St. Visiting Sunday, 48PM. Funeral services Monday, 11 AM, Church of Intercession, 550 W. 155th St. In lieu of flowers contributions may be made to The Alzheimers Association, 360 Lexington Avenue, 5th Floor, NY, NY 10017.
